<S%H3606>"Forasmuch<s%> <S%H6903><s%> <S%H1768><s%> as you are <S%H7972>sent<s%> by the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H3272>counselors<s%> to <S%H1240>inquire<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H3061>Judah<s%> and <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%> according to the <S%H1882>law<s%> of your <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is in your <S%H3028>hand,<s%>

with <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3702>money,<s%> <S%H3606>therefore<s%><S%H6903>,<s%> <S%H1836><s%> you shall <S%H629>diligently<s%> <S%H7066>buy<s%> <S%H8450>bulls,<s%> <S%H1798>rams,<s%> and <S%H563>lambs,<s%> with their grain <S%H4504>offerings<s%> and their <S%H5261>libations<s%> and <S%H7127>offer<s%> them on the <S%H4056>altar<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of your <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3606>"Whatever<s%> <S%H1768><s%> is <S%H4481>commanded<s%> <S%H2942><s%> by the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> let it be <S%H5648>done<s%> with <S%H149>zeal<s%> for the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> <S%H1768>lest<s%> there be <S%H7109>wrath<s%> <S%H5922>against<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H1123>sons.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of our fathers, <S%H1>who<s%> has <S%H834>put<s%> [such a thing] as <S%H5414>this<s%> in the king's <S%H2088>heart,<s%> to <S%H3820>adorn<s%> the <S%H6286>house<s%> of the <S%H1004>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>which<s%> is in <S%H834>Jerusalem,<s%>
